name: Word Pronounce
description: This extension lets you select a word in browser by double clicking and listen to its pronounciation. How to use: For British pronunciatoin => Ctrl+DoubleClick to select a word. You will hear pronunciation, or a beep if pronuncation is unavailable. US Pronunciation => Ctrl+Shift+DoubleClick
author: Praveen Nair (nick: NinethSense)
